alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore; Pittsburg; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 4:49AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Pushmataha, southern Latimer, southwestern Le Flore and southeastern Pittsburg Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 448 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Damon to near Daisy. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Clayton... Talihina... Howe... Fanshawe... Albion... Clayton Lake State Park... Talimena State Park... Higgins... Damon... Snow... Bengal... Tuskahoma... Yanush... Stanley... Lake Wister State Park... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Whitesboro... Dunbar... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
